https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yO53hYe3VHWxTvRnwHtgOstIBDh.jpg Tim and Cheryl Broadbent are excited to finally adopt Mona, a beautiful baby girl. But when the baby's biological father starts stalking them, their world turns upside down: through intimidation, manipulation, and violence, he is determined to take his daughter back. Written by Anonymous (IMDB.com). Adopting Terror
